50.eng-name: The Book of Seeking Refuge with Allah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Dharr said:"I entered the Masjid and the Messenger of Allah [SAW] was there, so I came and sat before him and he said: 'O Abu Dharr, seek refuge with Allah from the evils of the devils among the Jinn and mankind.' I said: 'Are there devils among mankind?' He said: 'Yes

chapter.ara-name: باب الاِسْتِعَاذَةِ مِنْ شَرِّ شَيَاطِينِ الإِنْسِ
chapter.eng-name: Seeking Refuge from the Evil of Devils Among Mankind
